column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As far as our ramen goes
column2: I'm sorry you do not consider our fare authentic. JINYA was founded by Tomonori Takahashi
column3: who owns several restaurants in Ebisu
column4: Japan. He brought the JINYA concept to the U.S. several years ago. As a JINYA franchise
column5: we try to make the taste of our ramen as authentic as possible
column6: following ultra-specific guidelines founded by Mr. Takahashi. It's possible you received a bowl that simply missed the mark. Should you change your mind and visit us again
column7: please ask for me or any of my managers and we will make sure you receive a bowl of ramen that meets your every expectation.
